name: Hotel Tourism
discretion: Tourism-related website.Through this website, users can get any hotel service. Click on Booking Now, but before that must log in.
disc1: Users can log in with Firebase authentication (Google Github).
disc2: private page when logged in - My Order, Manage All Order, Add New Service.
disc4: This website has some more services - courier service, resort service, tour guide service,
disc5: Front-end technology: React js, Bootstrap, React Router, Firebase Authentication,React Spring, Material UI
disc6: Back-end technology: Node js,Express js, MongoDB

name: perfume pride
discretion: This website is Niche website. This website is Perfume related only. This website has two dashboards -user and admin. User Dashboard - Payment, add a review, my order page.Admin Dashboard - Manage All Orders, Add A Product, Make Admin, Manage Products page that only admins can see, not users.
disc1: Have admin and user different dashboard.
disc2: Admin can delete, add, manage services.
disc5: React js, Bootstrap, React Router, Firebase Authentication,React Spring, Material UI

name: LifeLine Medical
discretion: This project-based online medical service concept can be found and this website is usually about medical services, healthcare, medical teams, appointments. We can take any service but you must log in first. If you click on a service, then see the details of those services.
disc1: Users need to log in (Google, GitHub, Email, and Password) with firebase
disc2: click on a service, then see the details of those services.
disc3: Firebase Authentication Used in this Website
disc4: click on a service, then see the details of those services.
disc5: React js, React bootstrap, plain bootstrap, Firebase Authentication, plain CSS are used.
